thread.title: Cats Acting Out Scenes from Star Wars and Other Movies Is Really Fantastic
thread.title_full: Cats Acting Out Scenes from Star Wars and Other Movies Is Really Fantastic

author: Casey Chan on Sploid, shared by Casey Chan to Gizmodo
title: Cats Acting Out Scenes from Star Wars and Other Movies Is Really Fantastic
text:
Go to permalink GIF 
Man, cats are so dang smart that they can pretty much replace actors in movies these days. I’m watching this wonderful scene reenactment of The Empire Strikes Back and I’m not sure I even miss the real Darth Vader or Luke Skywalker. Okay, I guess Darth Vader is still way more badass than any cat but the cat actor playing Luke is hilariously good. The crawl back, the clinging to the post, the scream... it’s so perfect. Advertisement 
Pasdidée is the person responsible for capturing and editing these perfect cat versions of popular movies like Psycho, The Lion King, and Titanic but the real stars have got to be the cats. They’re so good! 
Psycho :
